ComicInfo.Title: Cats Will Be Cats [Episode 8]; The Gauntcat [Episode 7] ; Catch as Cat Can [Episode 6]
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-15 21:30:50. [CVDB121206] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 00:17:42. [Issue ID 262827]
ComicInfo.Characters: Dr. Sigmund Morse,Phil Fireball,Cat Claw,Grgur,Mr. Baldwin,Connie Drake
ComicInfo.Summary:
Cats Will Be Cats [Episode 8]: Dr. Morse's experiment goes wrong when one of Baldwin's henchmen is transformed into the giant monster Grgur, but only temporarily. In the confusion, Cat Claw escapes with Connie Drake.
The Gauntcat [Episode 7] : Cat Claw confronts Baldwin and Dr. Morse as they brag about the experiment they are planning to conduct on Connie Drake.
Catch as Cat Can [Episode 6]: Cat Claw tracks Connie Drake's kidnappers to gang lord Baldwin's house, where Baldwin and Dr. Morse are preparing a dangerous experiment.
